title: Bank of England warned of ‘moral hazard’ risks from high-carbon bond purchases
lead: The Environmental Audit Committee says the bank’s corporate bond purchases are currently aligned with a ‘catastrophic’ 3.5°C temperature rise by 2100

title: IRENA members endorse launch of global energy transition forum
lead: The Global High-Level Forum on Energy Transition will use IRENA’s knowledge and convening powers to accelerate energy transition action from countries, industry, businesses, investors and academia

title: Shell, Vattenfall and MHI join forces for major hydrogen project at a former coal plant in Hamburg
lead: A scalable 100MW electrolyser fed by wind and solar power will be built at Moorburg station

title: Tesla boss pledges to donate $100m to the ‘best’ carbon capture tech
lead: Elon Musk plans to share more details about the prize next week

title: Has 2020 skewed perspectives on energy prices?
lead: Listen to the latest episode of the Resonance podcast here.

title: Scottish Government embarks on ‘green ports’ journey
lead: The Scottish green port model aims to be an exemplar, adopting best practice which helps deliver net zero emissions and fair work principles

title: West of England launches ‘first’ long-term e-scooter rental scheme
lead: Residents across Bath, North East Somerset, Bristol and South Gloucestershire will be able to take the lightweight vehicles home after a ride

title: US Climate Envoy John Kerry renews climate vows ‘on the road to Glasgow’
lead: Speaking with the COP26 President Alok Sharma, he said there is no time to waste on tackling climate change

title: New initiative to help banks in the Philippines, Mexico and Egypt scale climate finance
lead: It is designed to increase climate lending by participating banks to 30% of their portfolios by 2030, while reducing exposure to coal

title: Court rejects appeal against building ‘Europe’s largest’ gas plant in Yorkshire
lead: Green charity ClientEarth tried to overturn Secretary of State’s approval for Drax to convert its coal-fired units to gas
